content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5)

### Empty Production Line (Position x=5.5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=33.5-37.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- Additional pipe network between boiler and steam engine

### Electrical Distribution Network
Consists of multiple small electric poles forming a network (positions ranging from x=0.5-3.5, y=18.5-29.5)

### Unused Offshore Pump
- Standalone offshore pump at position (-5.5,26.5) not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Related Errors
- Cannot craft Assembling Machine 1 without first researching Automation technology
- Need to craft and place a Lab before being able to research technologies

### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure required entities are in inventory before attempting to place them (tried to place Lab without having one)

### Power System Issues
- Boiler is not functioning due to lack of fuel
- Steam engine has no input liquid, suggesting incomplete pipe connections between boiler and engine

### Connection Issues
- Ensure fluid-carrying entities (pipes, offshore pumps, boilers, steam engines) are properly connected to form working fluid systems
- One offshore pump is not connected to any system, making it non-functional
